# 数据的获取

```{r}
install.packages("remotes",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
remotes::install_git('https://gitee.com/GuangchuangYu/nCov2019')
library(nCov2019)
x = load_nCov2019()
head(x[])
q=x[]
```
